title: Populate Ranks page with Brotherhood of Copper hierarchy and regulations

requirements.text: Replace the current blank "/ranks" route content with a dedicated Ranks page that renders the user-provided sections for: Leadership Ranks (High Conductor, Conductor + its divisions list), Command Ranks (Paladin-Forgemaster, Paladin), Specialist Ranks (Artificer, Knight-Ranger, Knight), Initiate Ranks (Apprentice, Copper-Bearer), and "Internal Regulations & Culture" (The Copper Ledger, The Rite of Tempering, The Law of Resonance).

quotes: add to ranks page  A. Leadership Ranks ... 3. The Law of Resonance ... Violence between members is forbidden.

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /ranks displays a structured page (not null/blank) containing all provided headings and bullet points in English.
All rank titles and regulation titles appear as clearly differentiated headings/subheadings (e.g., section headers + item headers).
All bullet lists from the user message are rendered as visible lists (not collapsed into paragraphs), including the four Conductor divisions and the three conflict-resolution methods.
No user-provided meaning is altered; text content matches the userâ€™s provided wording aside from removing non-text glyph artifacts (e.g., "?", "??") if needed for clean rendering.

requirements.text: Implement the Ranks page with styling consistent with the existing copper-themed design system (typography, spacing, readable content width, and card/section treatments as appropriate), without changing the look/behavior of the shared site layout (top navigation and footer).
acceptanceCriteria: The /ranks page uses the existing site chrome (SiteNav + footer) unchanged and presents content within a centered container consistent with other pages (e.g., HomePage container usage).
Content is readable on mobile and desktop (responsive spacing, headings, and lists).
No changes are introduced to /divisions, /lore, or /history page content (they remain blank beyond shared chrome).

requirements.text: Update routing so that the "/ranks" route renders the new Ranks page component instead of the shared BlankPage component, while leaving the "/divisions", "/lore", and "/history" routes using BlankPage.
acceptanceCriteria: /ranks renders the new Ranks page component.
/divisions, /lore, and /history still render no page-specific content (BlankPage remains null).
Navigation links in the site nav continue to function and route correctly.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources).
Do not modify immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain unchanged (no Motoko canister methods needed for this static content update).
nonGoals: Adding content to Divisions, Lore, or History pages.
Adding authentication, admin editing, CMS functionality, or backend persistence for the ranks content.
Generating or integrating new images for the Ranks page.
